## hpr0796 :: Shane Marks Hacker Space Week Ireland

 
The HPR feed will be changing this week please email admin at hpr if you have issues
Apologies for the clipping on Ken's side

In today's interview Ken talks to Shane Marks from the Nexus maker space in Cork, Ireland.
The Irish Hackerspace Week runs from Saturday 20th until Sunday 28th of August 2011. 

https://www.tog.ie/
https://hackerspacecork.com/wp/
https://091labs.com/
https://www.milklabs.ie/files/
https://identi.ca/smarks
